name: ncpasswords
description: Easy to use yet feature-rich and secure password manager for Nextcloud

scripts.down: docker exec passwords-php bash -c 'find ./* -maxdepth 0 -not -name 'custom_apps' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -r --' &&  docker compose down --volumes
scripts.ldap:down: docker exec passwords-php bash -c 'find ./* -maxdepth 0 -not -name 'custom_apps' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -r --' &&  docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/ldap.yml down --volumes
scripts.saml:down: docker exec passwords-php bash -c 'find ./* -maxdepth 0 -not -name 'custom_apps' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -r --' &&  docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/saml.yml down --volumes
scripts.ldap+saml:start: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/ldap.yml -f docker/configs/saml.yml up -d
scripts.ldap+saml:stop: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/ldap.yml -f docker/configs/saml.yml stop
scripts.ldap+saml:logs: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/ldap.yml -f docker/configs/saml.yml logs -f
scripts.ldap+saml:down: docker exec passwords-php bash -c 'find ./* -maxdepth 0 -not -name 'custom_apps' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -r --' &&  docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/ldap.yml -f docker/configs/saml.yml down --volumes
scripts.postgres:down: docker exec passwords-php bash -c 'find ./* -maxdepth 0 -not -name 'custom_apps' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -r --' &&  docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/postgres.yml down --volumes
scripts.sqlite:down: docker exec passwords-php bash -c 'find ./* -maxdepth 0 -not -name 'custom_apps' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -r --' &&  docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker/configs/sqlite.yml down --volumes
scripts.docker:build: docker compose build --parallel --pull && docker compose up -d
scripts.mkcert: mkdir -p docker/volumes/nginx && mkcert -cert-file docker/volumes/nginx/default.pem -key-file docker/volumes/nginx/default.key localhost passwords.local && chmod -R 777 docker/volumes/nginx/

author: Marius Wieschollek
